get.description: List the available operations supported by the Microsoft.Maintenance resource provider

get.summary: Get Configuration records within a subscription

put.description: Apply maintenance updates to resource with parent
put.summary: Apply Updates to resource with parent

get.description: Track maintenance updates to resource with parent
get.summary: Track Updates to resource with parent

ApiVersionParameter.description: Version of the API to be used with the client request.
ApiVersionParameter.name: api-version

SubscriptionIdParameter.description: Subscription credentials that uniquely identify a Microsoft Azure subscription. The subscription ID forms part of the URI for every service call.
SubscriptionIdParameter.name: subscriptionId

ErrorDetails.description: An error response details received from the Azure Maintenance service.

code.description: Service-defined error code. This code serves as a sub-status for the HTTP error code specified in the response.

tags.description: Gets or sets tags of the resource

location.description: Gets or sets location of the resource

properties.description: Gets or sets properties of the resource

extensionProperties.description: Gets or sets extensionProperties of the maintenanceConfiguration

maintenanceScope.description: Gets or sets maintenanceScope of the configuration

namespace.description: Gets or sets namespace of the resource

MaintenanceError.description: An error response received from the Azure Maintenance service.

Operation.description: Represents an operation returned by the GetOperations request

OperationsListResult.description: Result of the List Operations operation

id.description: Fully qualified identifier of the resource

notBefore.description: Time when Azure will start force updates if not self-updated by customer before this time
